AD_LeversJammedPermanently.synopsis: Secret Cellar - Prison Loading Chamber - row of three inoperable levers

AD_MordocSeLanmere.synopsis: Residence Hall (beyond the curtains) - In the corner there's a round table with a bust (statue of a head) on it. Make this statue Clickable, generating a Narrator AD

AD_GildedClavichord.synopsis: Ballroom - The keyboard instrument on the musician's dais

AD_CrystalVaseLeft.synopsis: Cazador's Dungeon, Crystal Vases - One on each side of the North Arcane-Locked Gate

AD_ShyressaRunemaster.synopsis: Cazador's, Office Hall - Female Bust on table to right of tall statue

AD_SkullOnMarbleStand.synopsis: Cazador's Study, Skull on Marble Stand, make clickable

AD_AntiqueGlobe.synopsis: Cazador's, Study - Globe - Make this object Clickable

AD_ChamberlainDufay.synopsis: Residence Hall - Chamberlain's Suite, body of Dufay, AD if SwD is cast

AD_LuriannaSauvage.synopsis: Residence Hall - Chamberlain's Hidden Treasure Closet - the dead-werewolf body of Lurianna Sauvage if clicked upon

AD_CrystalVaseRight.synopsis: Cazador's Dungeon, Crystal Vases - One on each side of the North Arcane-Locked Gate

AD_LeversJammedPermanently_0.speaker: Narrator
AD_LeversJammedPermanently_0.text: *Jammed - permanently. No one will be using these controls to send any more hanging cages down into the caverns below.*

AD_MordocSeLanmere_0.speaker: Narrator
AD_MordocSeLanmere_0.text: *The inscription on this bust reads 'Mordoc SeLanmere'. Whoever that was.*

AD_GildedClavichord_0.speaker: Narrator
AD_GildedClavichord_0.text: *A gilded clavichord. You can almost hear the eerie fugues played upon it during the vampires' debauchery.*

AD_CrystalVaseLeft_0.speaker: Narrator
AD_CrystalVaseLeft_0.text: *A whisper that says it is the Vestige of Vellioth murmurs, 'Let me go'.*

AD_ShyressaRunemaster_0.speaker: Narrator
AD_ShyressaRunemaster_0.text: *The inscription on this bust reads 'Shyressa Runemaster'. Whoever that was.*

AD_SkullOnMarbleStand_0.speaker: Narrator
AD_SkullOnMarbleStand_0.text: *A jawless skull on a marble stand, without name or inscription. Apparently, whoever uses this desk needs no reminder of whose skull this was.*

AD_AntiqueGlobe_0.speaker: Narrator
AD_AntiqueGlobe_0.text: *An antique globe of Toril. The location of Baldur's Gate is easy to find - it's marked by a bloody thumbprint.*

AD_ChamberlainDufay_0.speaker: Narrator
AD_ChamberlainDufay_0.text: *By anger, force of will, or sheer stubbornness, some of the dead refuse to speak, even if magically compelled.*

AD_LuriannaSauvage_0.speaker: Narrator
AD_LuriannaSauvage_0.text: *A dead werewolf - and apparently, one who died by drinking a powerful acid potion. Speak with Dead will be of no use here.*

AD_CrystalVaseRight_0.speaker: Narrator
AD_CrystalVaseRight_0.text: *The whisper of Vellioth says, 'Lie where Cazador lies'.*
